text: Monoculture exhausts teams & stifles innovation. Look for the unexpected outcomes (double wins). They are emergent and not always obvious, thus take your eyes off the data, remember to use all your senses, and most importantly play! Humans play, machines donâ€™t. Surprise is a gift
